### English
Hideki Kakinuma is a Lecturer at the Faculty of Business Administration, International Pacific University, Japan.  

His research field lies mainly in Human Resource Management, Organizational Behavior, and Career Management. He is now focusing on research into talent management, and human resource management in service industries.
